title: Clear Vegetable Soup 🍵|| Clear Veg Soup || Winter Treat ❄️
content:
Soup : Clear vegetable soup : Indo-Chinese recipe Servings: 2 Duration : 12 mins Soup is a creamy liquid substance which can be made by combining many ingredients such as with milk, vegetables, sauce, cheese, salt , pepper & ginger- garlic these are ingredients are used to make any kind of soup, but varies from one to other cuisine. Winter is the comfort season to have warm / hot soup and snacks. This is the season to enjoy hot cup of soup in cold winter at evening time 😊 So I started winter treats to share hot soup and snacks. They are many soup varieties but today I prepared a famous and delicious soup which is Clear Vegetable Soup 🍜 have healthy and nutrition soup. Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Nutrition facts: Cabbage: Vitamin C & fiber Broccoli: Vitamins A,C & B6 and also iron, calcium, potassium, magnesium, fiber, protein & sodium Bell pepper : Vitamins A,C & B6 and also iron, calcium, potassium, magnesium, fiber & protein Sweet corn: Vitamins A and also iron,  potassium, magnesium, fiber and protein Garlic: vitamin Carrot : Vitamins A,C & B6 and also iron, calcium, potassium, magnesium, fiber & protein Spring onion: Vitamin A, C and iron & calcium Ingredients:
  • Water - 400 ml
  • Carrot - chopped - 1/2 cup
  • Broccoli - florets - 1/2 cup
  • Sweet corn kernels  - 1 cup
  • Cabbage - green/ red - Shredded - 1/2 cup
  • Green bell pepper - 1/2 cup - diced
  • Spring onions - 1/4 cup
  • Garlic cloves - 2 - finely chopped
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Pepper powder - fine - 1/2 tsp
Procedure:
  • Heat deep bowl or wok over medium heat
  • Add water
  • Add all chopped vegetables
  • Mix well and stir occasionally
  • After 5 mins Add salt and pepper
  • Let it cook more 5 mins
  • Turn off heat / burner/ cooktop
  • Serve hot at evening time / winter ❄️
  • Hope you like this soup, enjoy cooking. Have a nice day 😊
Step by step process shown below with pictures: [caption id="attachment_7520" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Clear Vegetable Soup 🍵[/caption] Note:
  • Youcan add any veggies such as mushroom, red / yellow bell pepper, celery, etc.,
  • Adjust salt & pepper according to taste
  • Full nutrition and healthy soup suits to everyone at home
  • Don't add any flour
